dgantt
Interface TaskRenderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicTaskRenderer
public interface TaskRenderer

Renderer for drawing tasks on a Gantt chart.

Method Summary
 void paintTask(java.awt.Graphics g, GanttChart chart, java.lang.Object task, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds, boolean selected)
          Renders the specified task on the Gantt chart.
 

Method Detail

paintTask

void paintTask(java.awt.Graphics g,
               GanttChart chart,
               java.lang.Object task,
               java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds,
               boolean selected)
Renders the specified task on the Gantt chart.

Parameters:
g - the graphics object used for rendering
chart - the Gantt chart containing the task
task - the task to be rendered
bounds - the rectangular bounds of the task on the Gantt chart
selected - true if the specified task is currently selected; false otherwise
